description:
Purpose: Template does the following.
1) Provision a Security Group.
2) Provision an EC2 instance.
3) Provision and Attach Volume to EC2 Instance.

Inputs Required: Image ID, Instance Name, Instance Type, Keypair Name, Volume Size, Volume Type and Volume IOPS.

Use case(s): Can be used to provision an EC2 instance and Volume Storage of desired size and type on demand/schedule.
name: AWS_Provision_VM_SG_Volume
